name: Kolob Canyon
description:
Introduction

Approach

Descent

Exit

Red tape

Entry to this area may be restricted; check for information regarding permits before attempting this trip.

There's several FREE primitive camping areas driving up along Kolob road. Pretty much turn right on any dirt road and camp there. Some areas are more popular than others.
